p:
After a GA search for low energy structures using EAM potential, a more accurate DFT energy was calculated for a selection of structures which are a good match with experiment XRD. All DFT calculations were performed using the Vienna ab initio simulation package (VASP)
14 with the projector-augmented wave (PAW) pseudopotential method
15, 16 and the generalized-gradient approximation (GGA)
17 .
